title: Since updating to android 10 Pixel 3a unable to enter password
content:
Since updating my  Pixel 3a to android 10 this morning I am not able to enter my password because my keyboard does not load. I don't use gboard, but before this update it appeared for entering the password after restarting. After unlocking I could use the keyboard fleksy.
I tried restarting two times already and also the keyboard-butten doesn't work.
